simple.gui.factory
Class ButtonFactory

java.lang.Object

public final class ButtonFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Makes buttons!
Slimmer alternative to SwingFactory
Created: May 14, 2009

Kenneth Pierce

Creates a JButton with common properties already set.

Parameters:
display - The text to be displayed on the button.

makeJButton

public static javax.swing.JButton makeJButton(java.lang.String display,
                                              java.lang.String actionCommand,
                                              java.awt.event.ActionListener al)
Creates a JButton with common properties already set.

Parameters:
display - The text to be displayed on the button.
actionCommand - The action command to be set with JButton.setActionCommand(String)
al - ActionListener to be added to the resulting JButton.
Returns:
JButton with text display and actionCommand actionCommand
